title: Thank You, Fukuoka!
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Let’s make today the best day ever!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes! Everyone welcomed us warmly yesterday, and we were able to perform comfortably!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It was interesting to hear stories about Fukuoka. Rina-chan Board says, “Gleaming!”<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>I want to report back to our fellow club members, but Kasumin really doesn’t want to leave yeeet!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Not wanting to leave but also wanting to leave is kinda contradictory, but I gotta agree with Little Puppy today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kasumin’s not a Little Puppy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>This feeling... I want to convey this in a song.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Yeah. I want to convey this pleasant feeling of being close to everyone.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Since we’re here, wouldn’t it be nice if everyone in the venue could help create it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Then, let’s put a Kasumin Box here and collect everyone’s opinions!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Okay!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
